message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll take the majority, but I'll give you a decent chunk.
I'll take the majority, but I'll give you a small consolation prize.
I'll take most, but you'll get a small taste of the pie.
I'll take most, but you'll get a slightly bigger slice this time.
You're getting desperate, I'll give you a tiny crumb.
I'll take most, but you'll get a slightly bigger crumb this time.
You're getting close to nothing, I'll give you almost all.
I'll take almost all, but you'll get the last crumb.
Let's go back to the original offer, it's fair.
